games.name: Among Us
games.description: Interactive, deduction-style game. You work as either a crewmate or imposter aboard a spaceship. Crewmates win by completing tasks, imposters win by killing crewmates.
games.price_desc: Free with ads on iOS/Android, paid for PC

games.name: Skribbl.io
games.description: Drawing game (one player draws using their mouse and everyone guesses in a chat)

games.name: Board Game Arena
games.description: Collection of board games including Solo (Uno clone with some new rules)

games.name: Webopoly
games.description: Monopoly-style game where all the properties are web companies!

games.name: Quiplash
games.description: Party game. Everyone answers prompts and the answers with the most votes win!
games.price_desc: $5.49 on Steam (also exists on other platforms)
